featured.text: Then as commercial air travel became popular in the 1950s and airplanes began flying higher and faster, three planes mysteriously broke apart in midair.
In the early days of aviation, plane windows 17 square in shape.
Thus, round windows are a major safety innovation that keeps planes from disintegrating mid-flight.
I had just arrived by plane and still had jetlag.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於空中運輸的飛行器，通常有固定的翼和一個或多個引擎。
definition.en_def: A vehicle designed for air travel that has wings and one or more engines.
definition.example: The plane took off smoothly from the runway.
